sentences.sContent: For someone to realize the value of information, you need to organize data to permit rapid discovery and utilization.
sentences.sContent_eng: For someone to realize the value of information, you need to organize data to permit rapid discovery and utilization.
sentences.sCn: 要使某人实现信息的价值，您需要相应地组织数据以允许快速的发现和利用。

sentences.sContent: At the conclusion of the evaluation run, you should gather and evaluate the utilization levels for all four resources.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the conclusion of the evaluation run, you should gather and evaluate the utilization levels for all four resources.
sentences.sCn: 在评价运行的结论中，您应该收集并评价所有四种资源的利用率水平。

sentences.sContent: One consideration is the utilization of pages.
sentences.sContent_eng: One consideration is the utilization of pages.
sentences.sCn: 一个考虑因素是页的利用率。

phrases.pCn: 资源利用，资源运用；资源运用性
能源利用；能量利用率；能的利用
